players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the villager.
Day 1 begins.

players.name: Bob
memory: You're Bob, the mafioso.
Night 1 begins.
You killed Alice.
Alice was found dead.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "I investigated Bob last night and he is the mafioso. We must vote him out today."
Diana: "I trust Charlie's investigation. Let's vote Bob out to secure the town win."
You: "I am the detective and I investigated Charlie last night. He is the mafioso, not me. Charlie is lying to save himself."
You: "Charlie is clearly the mafioso trying to frame me. I'm the real detective - I investigated him last night and he's guilty. Diana, don't fall for his deception."
Diana: "I believe Charlie. Bob's claim doesn't add up - why would a real detective wait to counter-claim until after being accused?"
Charlie: "Bob's counter-claim is impossible. As the detective, I investigated him and confirmed he's mafia. There's only one detective in this game - me."
Votes: Bob voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Bob, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested

players.name: Charlie
